explanation: [0-0] On a white marble countertop, the lower part of a child's feet can be seen at the top of the frame, while the bottom of the frame shows a grey floor.

[0-3] The camera then moves upwards, revealing a little girl in pink shorts and a floral top sitting on a kitchen island. In front of her is a mineral water bottle. In the background, a kitchen sink and faucet are visible. A woman in a black top sits next to the island, her left arm resting on the surface as she talks on her phone held to her left ear. The phone is connected to a charging cable. Wooden cabinets can be seen in the distance. The little girl then tosses the water bottle upwards. It lands upright on the island. The woman on the phone, noticing the girl's action, opens her mouth in surprise and leans forward slightly to look. The camera then pans out, revealing that the woman in black is sitting with her feet resting on a stool. A blue baby bottle lies discarded on the floor.
